about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of industrial mastery! Step into the captivating and intricate realm of factory creation with Assembly Line 2, the ultimate idle/automation game that challenges your strategic thinking and management skills. Immerse yourself in an experience where you have the power to design, build, and optimize your very own industrial empire. From the first bolt to the final product, take control of every aspect as you craft intricate assembly lines, streamline production processes, and conquer the challenges of industrial management. Now fully optimized for desktop, Assembly Line 2 offers an unparalleled level of precision and control, making your journey into the world of automation more immersive and engaging than ever before.

Key features:

  • Factory Management: Oversee every step of production, making strategic decisions to maximize efficiency.
  • Advanced Blueprints: Unlock and experiment with blueprints to craft high-tech components and premium products.
  • Multiple Machines: Organize your factory with specialized machinery to create complex, high-value products.
  • Machine Upgrades: Enhance your machines to boost production speed, reduce downtime, and achieve peak performance.
  • Idle Automation: Set up automated production lines, allowing your factory to run smoothly and grow your industrial empire.
  • PC Platform Optimization: Meticulously redesigned for PC with intuitive controls and a seamless interface.

Are you ready to build, automate, and dominate? Dive into the world of Assembly Line 2 and experience the thrill of industrial innovation like never before!

Welcome to the world of industrial mastery! Step into the captivating and intricate realm of factory creation with Assembly Line 2, the ultimate idle/automation game that challenges your strategic thinking and management skills. Immerse yourself in an experience where you have the power to design, build, and optimize your very own industrial empire. From the first bolt to the final product, take control of every aspect as you craft intricate assembly lines, streamline production processes, and conquer the challenges of industrial management. Now fully optimized for desktop, Assembly Line 2 offers an unparalleled level of precision and control, making your journey into the world of automation more immersive and engaging than ever before.

Key features:

  • Factory Management: Oversee every step of production, making strategic decisions to maximize efficiency.
  • Advanced Blueprints: Unlock and experiment with blueprints to craft high-tech components and premium products.
  • Multiple Machines: Organize your factory with specialized machinery to create complex, high-value products.
  • Machine Upgrades: Enhance your machines to boost production speed, reduce downtime, and achieve peak performance.
  • Idle Automation: Set up automated production lines, allowing your factory to run smoothly and grow your industrial empire.
  • PC Platform Optimization: Meticulously redesigned for PC with intuitive controls and a seamless interface.

Are you ready to build, automate, and dominate? Dive into the world of Assembly Line 2 and experience the thrill of industrial innovation like never before!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple M CPU or Intel Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Assembly Line 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10 and 11, 64-bit only
  • Processor: Dual core 2Ghz+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit operating system is required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Assembly Line 2, you take charge of your factory, where strategic organization is key. Create intricate production lines, unlocking a plethora of blueprints to craft advanced resources. Fine-tune and upgrade machines for optimal efficiency and elevating your empire to new heights.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
